content.question: Based on the data in the bar graph and your knowledge of the course, which of the following is an accurate statement that can be made about political socialization?

choices.label: Young people are closer to and tend to rely more on their peers than their parents for political information.
The political orientation of parents has a great influence on how their child will view politics.
Family, schools, peers, and social environments, including civic and religious organizations, all have an equal role in the political socialization of young people.
The impact of globalization on political culture and an expansive social media network has the greatest influence on childrenâ€™s political socialization.

content.answer: The political orientation of parents has a great influence on how their child will view politics.
